alert.note: Alert for Roscommon (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 9:02AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Roscommon County through 945 AM EDT... At 901 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Roscommon County Airport, or near Prudenville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Roscommon County Airport around 905 AM EDT. Prudenville around 915 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Roscommon Township, Lake St. Helen, Nester Township and Twin Lakes Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
